timeline.message:
Add default logback.xml for server-chassis-spring as discussed in #4162 and #3392

Signed-off-by: Ljupcho Palashevski <ljupcho.palashevski@ing.com>

Enhance SLF4J auditlog store connector and related user docs

Signed-off-by: Ljupcho Palashevski <ljupcho.palashevski@ing.com>

timeline.bodyText: What does "technical" mean - I prefer to use "developer" since that is the audience that this logging is suitable for.
timeline.author: mandy-chessell
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,8 +38,8 @@ its **application.properties** file found in the **resources** subdirectory.
 * Defining the port that the OMAG Server Platform will listen on for
   REST API calls.
   
-* Controlling the level of developer logging that the platform
-  produces when it is running.
+* Controlling the level of technical logging that the platform

replies.bodyText: I came up with "techical" exactly because I was trying to distinguish from the AuditLog but now I see and agree with you that it is not meaninful from user perspective, reverted.
replies.author: lpalashevski

timeline.author: mandy-chessell
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+
+# Configuring logging options for OMAG server platform
+
+
+## Options for technical logging system using Spring Boot server chassis

timeline.bodyText: Add "developer" to the title to distinguish between this logging and the AuditLog
timeline.author: mandy-chessell
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+
+# Configuring logging options for OMAG server platform

replies.bodyText: I reprhased it to "developer logging" but I still want to disucss different viewpoint on the call today.
replies.author: lpalashevski
